verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִי֙ <WH2005> I am going מֵעִ֣יר <WH5782> Behold I will raise up עַל־ <WH5921> against בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> against Babylon וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> and against them that dwell לֵ֣ב <WH3820> in the midst קָמָ֑י <WH6965> of them that rise up ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> wind מַשְׁחִֽית׃ <WH7843> against me a destroying

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֨י <WH7971> And will send לְבָבֶ֤ל ׀ <WH894> unto Babylon זָרִים֙ <WH2114> fanners וְזֵר֔וּהָ <WH2219> that shall fan וִיבֹקְק֖וּ <WH1238> her and shall empty אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָ֑הּ <WH776> her land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become עָלֶ֛יהָ <WH5921> will be opposed מִסָּבִ֖יב <WH5439> they shall be against her round about בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> for in the day רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> of trouble

אֶֽל־ <WH413> Nor יִדְרֹ֤ךְ <WH1869> let the archer [יִדְרֹךְ <WH1869> bend כ] הַדֹּרֵךְ֙ <WH1869> bend קַשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH7198> his bow וְאֶל־ <WH408> nay יִתְעַ֖ל <WH5927> and against [him that] lifteth himself up בְּסִרְיֹנ֑וֹ <WH5630> in his brigandine וְאַֽל־ <WH413> Nor תַּחְמְלוּ֙ <WH2550> and spare אֶל־ <WH413> Nor בַּ֣חֻרֶ֔יהָ <WH970> ye not her young men הַחֲרִ֖ימוּ <WH2763> destroy ye utterly כָּל־ <WH3605> all צְבָאָֽהּ׃ <WH6635> all her host

וְנָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> shall fall חֲלָלִ֖ים <WH2491> Thus the slain בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans וּמְדֻקָּרִ֖ים <WH1856> and [they that are] thrust through בְּחוּצוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH2351> in her streets

כִּ֠י <WH3588> Although לֹֽא־ <WH3808> neither אַלְמָ֨ן <WH488> [hath] not [been] forsaken יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> For Israel וִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> nor Judah מֵֽאֱלֹהָ֔יו <WH430> of his God מֵֽיְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts כִּ֤י <WH3588> Although אַרְצָם֙ <WH776> though their land מָלְאָ֣ה <WH4390> was filled אָשָׁ֔ם <WH817> with sin מִקְּד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> against the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

נֻ֣סוּ ׀ <WH5127> Flee out מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> of the midst בָּבֶ֗ל <WH894> of Babylon וּמַלְּטוּ֙ <WH4422> and deliver אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> his soul אַל־ <WH408> not תִּדַּ֖מּוּ <WH1826> be not cut off בַּעֲוֹנָ֑הּ <WH5771> in her iniquity כִּי֩ <WH3588> for עֵ֨ת <WH6256> for this [is] the time נְקָמָ֥ה <WH5360> vengeance הִיא֙ <WH1931> this לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S גְּמ֕וּל <WH1576> unto her a recompence ה֥וּא <WH1931> this מְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> he will render לָֽהּ׃

כּוֹס־ <WH3563> cup זָהָ֤ב <WH2091> [hath been] a golden בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> Babylon בְּיַד־ <WH3027> hand יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> in the LORD'S מְשַׁכֶּ֖רֶת <WH7937> drunken כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> that made all the earth מִיֵּינָהּ֙ <WH3196> of her wine שָׁת֣וּ <WH8354> have drunken גוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> the nations עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that יִתְהֹלְל֥וּ <WH1984> are mad גוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> therefore the nations

פִּתְאֹ֛ם <WH6597> is suddenly נָפְלָ֥ה <WH5307> fallen בָבֶ֖ל <WH894> Babylon וַתִּשָּׁבֵ֑ר <WH7665> and destroyed הֵילִ֣ילוּ <WH3213> howl עָלֶ֗יהָ <WH5921> over קְח֤וּ <WH3947> for her take צֳרִי֙ <WH6875> balm לְמַכְאוֹבָ֔הּ <WH4341> for her pain אוּלַ֖י <WH194> Perhaps תֵּרָפֵֽא׃ <WH7495> if so be she may be healed

[רִפִּאנוּ כ] (רִפִּ֣ינוּ <WH7495> healing ק) אֶת־ <WH853> בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> Babylon וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not נִרְפָּ֔תָה <WH7495> We would have healed עִזְב֕וּהָ <WH5800> forsake וְנֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> go אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every one לְאַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> into his own country כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָגַ֤ע <WH5060> reacheth אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> unto heaven מִשְׁפָּטָ֔הּ <WH4941> for her judgment וְנִשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> and is lifted up עַד־ <WH5704> to the very שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> [even] to the skies

הוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> hath brought forth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> צִדְקֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH6666> our righteousness בֹּ֚אוּ <WH935> come וּנְסַפְּרָ֣ה <WH5608> and let us declare בְצִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> in Zion אֶֽת־ <WH853> מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> the work יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God

הָבֵ֣רוּ <WH1305> Make bright הַחִצִּים֮ <WH2671> the arrows מִלְא֣וּ <WH4390> gather הַשְּׁלָטִים֒ <WH7982> the shields הֵעִ֣יר <WH5782> hath raised up יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> the spirit מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings מָדַ֔י <WH4074> of the Medes כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because עַל־ <WH5921> is against בָּבֶ֥ל <WH894> [is] against Babylon מְזִמָּת֖וֹ <WH4209> for his device לְהַשְׁחִיתָ֑הּ <WH7843> to destroy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because נִקְמַ֤ת <WH5360> it because it [is] the vengeance יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD הִ֔יא <WH1931> he נִקְמַ֖ת <WH5360> the vengeance הֵיכָלֽוֹ׃ <WH1964> of his temple

אֶל־ <WH413> against חוֹמֹ֨ת <WH2346> upon the walls בָּבֶ֜ל <WH894> of Babylon שְׂאוּ־ <WH5375> Set up נֵ֗ס <WH5251> the standard הַחֲזִ֙יקוּ֙ <WH2388> strong הַמִּשְׁמָ֔ר <WH4929> make the watch הָקִ֙ימוּ֙ <WH6965> set up שֹֽׁמְרִ֔ים <WH8104> the watchmen הָכִ֖ינוּ <WH3559> prepare הָאֹֽרְבִ֑ים <WH693> the ambushes כִּ֚י <WH3588> for גַּם־ <WH1571> has both זָמַ֣ם <WH2161> hath both devised יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD גַּם־ <WH1571> has both עָשָׂ֕ה <WH6213> and done אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> What דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> that which he spake אֶל־ <WH413> concerning יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> against the inhabitants בָבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

[שֹׁכַנְתִּי כ] (שֹׁכַנְתְּ֙ <WH7931> abide ק) עַל־ <WH5921> and מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> upon many רַבַּ֖ת <WH7227> abundant אֽוֹצָרֹ֑ת <WH214> in treasures בָּ֥א <WH935> is come קִצֵּ֖ךְ <WH7093> thine end אַמַּ֥ת <WH520> [and] the measure בִּצְעֵֽךְ׃ <WH1215> of thy covetousness

נִשְׁבַּ֛ע <WH7650> hath sworn יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בְּנַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> by himself כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo מִלֵּאתִ֤יךְ <WH4390> [saying] Surely I will fill אָדָם֙ <WH120> thee with men כַּיֶּ֔לֶק <WH3218> as with caterpillers וְעָנ֥וּ <WH6030> and they shall lift up עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> over הֵידָֽד׃ <WH1959> a shout ס

עֹשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> He hath made אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the earth בְּכֹח֔וֹ <WH3581> by his power מֵכִ֥ין <WH3559> he hath established תֵּבֵ֖ל <WH8398> the world בְּחָכְמָת֑וֹ <WH2451> by his wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָת֖וֹ <WH8394> by his understanding נָטָ֥ה <WH5186> and hath stretched out שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> the heaven

לְק֨וֹל <WH6963> [his] voice תִּתּ֜וֹ <WH5414> When he uttereth הֲמ֥וֹן <WH1995> [there is] a multitude מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> of waters בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> in the heavens וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> to ascend נְשִׂאִ֖ים <WH5387> and he causeth the vapours מִקְצֵה־ <WH7097> from the ends אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth בְּרָקִ֤ים <WH1300> lightnings לַמָּטָר֙ <WH4306> with rain עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> he maketh וַיֹּ֥צֵא <WH3318> and bringeth forth ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> the wind מֵאֹצְרֹתָֽיו׃ <WH214> out of his treasures

נִבְעַ֤ר <WH1197> is brutish כָּל־ <WH3605> All אָדָם֙ <WH120> Every man מִדַּ֔עַת <WH1847> by [his] knowledge הֹבִ֥ישׁ <WH3001> is confounded כָּל־ <WH3605> Every צֹרֵ֖ף <WH6884> every founder מִפָּ֑סֶל <WH6459> by the graven image כִּ֛י <WH3588> for שֶׁ֥קֶר <WH8267> [is] falsehood נִסְכּ֖וֹ <WH5262> for his molten image וְלֹא־ <WH3808> is no ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> and [there is] no breath בָּֽם׃

הֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> They [are] vanity הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> like מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> the work תַּעְתֻּעִ֑ים <WH8595> of errors בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> in the time פְּקֻדָּתָ֖ם <WH6486> of their visitation יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <WH6> they shall perish

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> like כְאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> these חֵ֣לֶק <WH2506> The portion יַעֲק֗וֹב <WH3290> of Jacob כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יוֹצֵ֤ר <WH3335> [is] not like them for he [is] the former הַכֹּל֙ <WH3605> of all ה֔וּא <WH1931> and of וְשֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> of all things and [Israel is] the rod נַחֲלָת֑וֹ <WH5159> of his inheritance יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name ס

מַפֵּץ־ <WH4661> Thou [art] my battle axe אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you לִ֔י כְּלֵ֖י <WH3627> [and] weapons מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> of war וְנִפַּצְתִּ֤י <WH5310> for with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֙ גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> the nations וְהִשְׁחַתִּ֥י <WH7843> and with thee will I destroy בְךָ֖ מַמְלָכֽוֹת׃ <WH4467> kingdoms

וְנִפַּצְתִּ֣י <WH5310> And with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֔ ס֖וּס <WH5483> the horse וְרֹֽכְב֑וֹ <WH7392> and his rider וְנִפַּצְתִּ֣י <WH5310> and with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֔ רֶ֖כֶב <WH7393> the chariot וְרֹכְבֽוֹ׃ <WH7392> and his rider

וְנִפַּצְתִּ֤י <WH5310> With thee also will I break in pieces בְךָ֙ אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man וְאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> and woman וְנִפַּצְתִּ֥י <WH5310> and with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֖ זָקֵ֣ן <WH2205> old וָנָ֑עַר <WH5288> and young וְנִפַּצְתִּ֣י <WH5310> and with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֔ בָּח֖וּר <WH970> the young man וּבְתוּלָֽה׃ <WH1330> and the maid

וְנִפַּצְתִּ֤י <WH5310> I will also break in pieces בְךָ֙ רֹעֶ֣ה <WH7462> with thee the shepherd וְעֶדְר֔וֹ <WH5739> and his flock וְנִפַּצְתִּ֥י <WH5310> and with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֖ אִכָּ֣ר <WH406> the husbandman וְצִמְדּ֑וֹ <WH6776> and his yoke of oxen וְנִפַּצְתִּ֣י <WH5310> and with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֔ פַּח֖וֹת <WH6346> captains וּסְגָנִֽים׃ <WH5461> and rulers

וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֨י <WH7999> And I will render לְבָבֶ֜ל <WH894> unto Babylon וּלְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> and all יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and to all the inhabitants כַשְׂדִּ֗ים <WH3778> of Chaldea אֵ֧ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> for all רָעָתָ֛ם <WH7451> all their evil אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> that they have done בְצִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> in Zion לְעֵֽינֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5869> in your sight נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold אֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH413> I am against הַ֤ר <WH2022> mountain הַמַּשְׁחִית֙ <WH4889> Behold I [am] against thee O destroying נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הַמַּשְׁחִ֖ית <WH7843> which destroyest אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> all the earth וְנָטִ֨יתִי <WH5186> and I will stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֜י <WH3027> mine hand עָלֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> against וְגִלְגַּלְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH1556> upon thee and roll thee down מִן־ <WH4480> from הַסְּלָעִ֔ים <WH5553> from the rocks וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> and will make לְהַ֥ר <WH2022> mountain שְׂרֵפָֽה׃ <WH8316> thee a burnt

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יִקְח֤וּ <WH3947> And they shall not take מִמְּךָ֙ <WH4480> from אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> of thee a stone לְפִנָּ֔ה <WH6438> for a corner וְאֶ֖בֶן <WH68> nor a stone לְמֽוֹסָד֑וֹת <WH4146> for foundations כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שִׁמְמ֥וֹת <WH8077> but thou shalt be desolate עוֹלָ֛ם <WH5769> for ever תִּֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
